alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:20PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Linn, southern Buchanan, southwestern Delaware and northern Benton Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 519 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Winthrop to La Porte City. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Winthrop around 525 PM CDT. Vinton and Masonville around 535 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Urbana, Ryan, Walker and Center Point. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 37 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
